title: mystery gift problem :(
body: I self mystery skin gifted myself just a couple minutes ago, and i got coral reef malphite. It cost me 490rp to mystery skin gift myself and that skin is currently on sale for 375rp. I thought the value would have to be 490rp or more. Please someone help!

replies.body: The value of the skins normal price, not sale price. So you just have bad luck.
oh :( thanks for your comment ! i guess it made up for it because i just got slay belle kat :D
